path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Asva Labs (IDO) Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Unhandled case for different decimal tokens
findings.description: The contracts have an unhandled case where if the decimal value of the token used to purchase the IDOToken does not match, the desired output is not achieved.

findings.title: Potential array out of bounds error
